actions.text: On agreeing to the Taylor (NC) amendment (A024) Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 194 (Roll no. 388).
Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Taylor (NC) to the Udall (CO) amendment (A020).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Taylor (NC) to the Udall (CO) amendment (A020).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Taylor (NC) amendment (A024) Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 194 (Roll no. 388).

amends_amendment.description: Amendment, as amended by the Taylor (NC) amendment (A024), prohibits the use of funds by the Bureau of Land Management to use the recordable disclaimer regulations with regard to any lands within a designated national monument, wilderness study area, National Park Service unit, National Wildlife Refuge System unit, or lands within the national wilderness preservation system.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record of July 15, 2003 that none of the funds made available by this Act may be used to implement amendments to Bureau of Land Management regulations on Recordable Disclaimers of Interest in Land.

purpose: An amendment to limit the ability to file disclaimers that are within a designated National Mounment, Wilderness Study Area, National Park System unit, National Wildlife Refuge System unit or lands within the National Wilderness Preservation System.
